website_summaries.verdict: The Philips AEA7100 Wireless Speaker and Microphone might be worth the bucks for hard-core karaoke fans, but $180 is a lot to ask for an accessory that takes a back seat to the free StarMaker karaoke app.
pros: Karaoke kit for iPad boasts wireless Bluetooth microphone and speaker
free StarMaker app handles karaoke functionality onscreen
cons: Without an adapter, 30-pin dock connector only works with iPad 3 and older iPads
voice delays from the Bluetooth microphone reduce the fun
there are better-sounding wireless speakers for half the price
you can't use your existing song library -- each song must be purchased separately

customer_reviews.title: ONLY WORKS WITH OLD IPADS.
customer_reviews.text: ONLY WORKS WITH OLD IPADS. There is only one spot where it says "30 pin connector" so look carefully. I don't like the software, which is personal. It seems to focus on recording yourself and sharing those videos online. It will not charge your pad even though it is plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Trex

customer_reviews.title: Could use some updating
customer_reviews.text: We sent this back. Bought it to enjoy e family bit did not have an iPhone. Used it w an older ipad which was a struggle to get to work. We couldn't get it off of a sideways presentation. It's a great design. ..light and easy to carry. Microphone is comfortable together handle and has no cord. Could be a great item but needs some fine tuning. Great for the price compared to traditional karaoke machines.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work the way it should
customer_reviews.text: The app for this may be outdated. It was unavailable for my ipad. I found a similar app to use instead. The volume was very low a d would not turn up. You have to purchase songs to use this or else you will be singin the sames songs over and over to earn stars to purchase songs with. Takes the fun out of it and very time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Microphone only works to record. You will not be ...
customer_reviews.text: Microphone only works to record. You will not be able to hear your voice through the speakers in real time.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Is not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work with apps, only for Bluetooth use with the smartphone
customer_reviews.author: kwang s ro

customer_reviews.title: microphone did not work.
customer_reviews.text: The microphone does not work and the song selections aren't that great. Would not recommend buying this for that fact
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like
customer_reviews.text: This is really a docking station for your iphone, ipod, etc. The application to download is not that great and the microphone never worked through the speakers of the docking station. We returned it and were disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mb

customer_reviews.title: Most used gift this christmas
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a family gift, now I don't get to use my iPad because the family is singing. The app is ok but of course requires a subscription to get to most of the songs, that should be explained up front. The vocals you sing sometimes don't come through very well on the recording, could be the mic or where they are holding it, but the fun part is the singing and trying to figure out how to hit the notes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it was not compatible with my iPad so I had to return it. That was very disappointing as it was a Christmas gift we were all excited about.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Got it for the woman for Christmas. She seems to enjoy it. The only thing I would be wary of is the fact that you do not get all of the songs right off the bat. You have to either earn them or I believe pay for them.. Works well with the iPad and also works good with Bluetooth. Speaker quality is what I expected, gets loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Parker

customer_reviews.title: Lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: This machine is sturdy, not junk. At our family get togethers, we have senior citizens, forty somethings, twenty somethings, teenagers, and ten year olds really enjoying this.
customer_reviews.author: H. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: In addition to finding a centipede inside the package, the product was not as i requested it. It was 120 V instead of 230 V. The speaker didn't work properly
customer_reviews.author: Hasan Shloun

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to use with other product than Ipad 2.
customer_reviews.text: I choose it for my Little daugther, 9 years olds, I like de article, but because of de Apple App needed to Works its only Works with IPAD 2, because of IOS 6 or better, and because of its 30 pin
customer_reviews.author: German Dario Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Star is born!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it! We may have a new Taylor Swift on our hands!
customer_reviews.author: James R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Would give it a pass....
customer_reviews.text: I got this item on a whim, thinking that my 8 and 10 year old kids would enjoy playing with it. I can't see it ever being more than the occasionally played with toy or getting 15 minutes of fame. Limited songs are a bummer; dislike the idea that you need to purchase a subscription or earn tokens to get more songs. As far as it working only with an iPad (or other Apple products)....not a deal breaker to me because that was my assumption when I picked it out. This is too expensive for what it offers/is.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Mulhern

customer_reviews.title: Attractive looking speaker with limited versatility
customer_reviews.text: The Philips Bluetooth speaker is attractive looking and designed with good functional purpose. There is also Internet integration with this product, with an online library of songs and the ability to share songs on popular social media sites such as Facebook, Twitter and even e-mail. I just wish the Speaker and Karaoke system could be used with more tablets other than just the iPad (or at least offer some type of adapter for Android tablets).
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: items works, Wish it didn't require an iPad
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this item works well. It works easily in a 10 foot radius, and is decently integrated. It requires an iPad to function from what I can see, though it would be nice if you could use it with other devices/or standalone.
customer_reviews.author: A4Q96

customer_reviews.title: Consider the end user when purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I think this product works if you have very limited expectations. For kids and other assorted young people, they will have fun with it. Adults will find it a little cheap in build and options, as well as sound quality. So the main issue is who will be using it. Setup is very easy, and I can see this as a winner for kids--parents don't have to do much to get it working and kids can just have fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: JujubeMBA

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Affordable Karaoke Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, affordable karaoke machine. it's small enough to be easily portable, and it has a very nice sound. It's great for the kids to use when they want to play rock star. It should be lots of fun at our next party. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Lover

customer_reviews.title: Really cool product, but amazing speaker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on discount to have fun with the kids, but did not expect to use the speaker as my main option. Bluetooth is amazing. I walk into the kitchen and easily connect to play music while we prepare meals and dance like crazy! Do yourself a favor and add this to your daily routine! Even the kids ipods can connect!
customer_reviews.author: FooFighter

product_meta.title: Philips AEA7100/17 StarMaker Wireless Bluetooth Portable Speaker & Wireless Karaoke Mic for iPad
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingPut on your own concert with a Philips Bluetooth speaker and wireless microphone. With "StarMaker Karaoke + Auto-Tune" app on your iPad, you can sing the hottest tracks, share them online and even battle with your friends.


 * Play all your music wirelessly via Bluetooth speaker
 * High-sensitivity Bluetooth mic for top singing experience
 * Sing in perfect rhythm with on-screen lyrics
 * Constantly updated large song library available for download
 * Share your recordings on Facebook, Twitter and email
 * Speaker dock compatible with 30-pin connectors
 * Bluetooth functionality compatible with all Bluetooth-enabled devices, including the newest iPhones/iPods/iPads



FROM THE MANUFACTURER


With the Philips AEA7100 Bluetooth Speaker and Wireless Microphone, you can put on your own concert using your iPad or simply stream and enjoy your music wirelessly with the Bluetooth speaker. This versatile wireless microphone and Bluetooth speaker set comes with the StarMaker app to keep you in sync with the music beat. It also includes free hit songs to get you started, a battle mode to compete with friends and family, and the option to share your recordings via Facebook, Twitter, and email.

The Bluetooth microphone features a range of up to 30 feet. View larger.

Comes with the StarMaker app to keep you in sync with the music beat. 
View larger.

BLUETOOTH SPEAKER AND DOCK
Boasting 10 watts of combined power to render your vocals in fine detail, the AEA7100 speaker also acts as a Bluetooth speaker or speaker dock for your smartphone, tablet, or iPod. You can stream music wirelessly via Bluetooth from any Bluetooth-enabled device, including the iPhone 5 and newest iPods, or simply connect to the 30-pin connector atop the unit to start enjoying your tunes.

HIGH-SENSITIVITY WIRELESS MICROPHONE
The Philips AEA7100 microphone offers high-sensitivity and dynamic range, ensuring every detail of your vocal performance will come through loud and clear in both soft ballads and rock numbers. The Bluetooth microphone features a range of up to 30 feet. You can leave the mic on its stand to free both hands or detach it to incorporate it in your dance routine. It requires three AAA batteries (not included).

AUTO-TUNE KEEPS YOU SINGING ON KEY
Even if you can't always sing on key, Auto-Tune audio processor will help you sound like a pro. This software alters vocal pitch, tuning vocal tracks sung slightly off key into perfectly even performances you can be proud of.

STARMAKER APP PROVIDES GUIDING VOCALS
To keep you singing in sync, StarMaker Karaoke with Auto-Tune app provides a guiding vocal function that shows lyrics of each song on screen with a changing color guide. Just follow the cue to stay in beat with the rhythm. You can turn the guiding vocals up or down to your liking.

INCLUDES FREE HIT SONGS AND LARGE SONG LIBRARY
The StarMaker app comes with free hit songs to get you started singing. You also have the option to expand your library collection with in-app purchases of the latest chart-toppers, oldies, and classics.

BATTLE MODE TO COMPETE WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY
With battle mode, you can test your skills by challenging your friends and family to a vocal competition. The StarMaker app will deliberate and score you on criteria such as pitch, rhythm, range, and voice quality.

ONLINE SHARING VIA SOCIAL MEDIA AND EMAIL
Record your songs and post your audio recordings online to let others appreciate your talented performance. A score is given to every song you sing and you also have the option to post via Facebook, Twitter, or email.

ABOUT PHILIPS
With a proud history in technology, including the invention of the compact audio tape cassette and the CD, Philips is committed to understanding and meeting the needs and desires of consumers. With over 50,000 registered patents, Philips is a global leader in innovation, receiving numerous international design and acoustics awards every year.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Philips AEA7100 Wireless Microphone and Bluetooth Speaker, AC adapter, and quick start guide.

WIRELESS MICROPHONE AND BLUETOOTH SPEAKER
AT A GLANCE:
 * Wireless microphone frees you up to perform
 * Bluetooth speaker is compatible with smartphones, tablets, and iPods
 * Auto-Tune keeps you singing on key
 * StarMaker app uses color guide to help you follow lyrics
 * Challenge friends to vocal competition with battle mode
 * Share recordings online via social media and email
 * Compatible with iPod, iPhone, and iPad

Challenge your friends and family to a vocal competition with battle mode. View larger.

Battle mode. View larger.

Large song library. View larger.

Guiding vocals. View larger.

Auto-Tune. View larger.
feature_bullets: Play all your music wirelessly via Bluetooth speaker
High-sensitivity Bluetooth mic for top singing experience
Sing in perfect rhythm with on-screen lyrics through your iPad
Constantly updated large song library available for download
Share your recordings on Facebook, Twitter and email
